ygData.subject: Re: LFG, Anyone willing is welcome.
ygData.msgSnippet: That sounds like fun. I am trying to level up my enchanter right no tho, seems harder than heck. IF I can make it to level 30 then it would be fun to make
ygData.messageBody:
That sounds like fun. I am trying to level up my enchanter right no
tho, seems harder than heck. IF I can make it to level 30 then it
would be fun to make another char too :)

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "hoggtyed" <hoggtyed@y...> wrote:
> Wanting to meet new poeple and make some new friends. I would
like
> to propose a game night on either Wens, or Thurs nights 6p to 9p
> eastern time. We all start new toons and only play them once a
week
> on game night unless you miss a night and need to make up lvs.
> Any server or server type is good to me PVP, PVE, or blue , Even
> blue and we follow discord. We could all play one type of toon
> (beastlords or mages) or shoot for balnce or all iskar some thing
> like that. Please post if you would be interested in joing we
will
> all be making new toons thatway we are all equal and broke.
> Thnx Hogg
